Summary: Spherical red object sailing across the sky. No flashing lights or noise.
divs: Sighting DetailsI was walking out to my backyard to go to the garage to get some bottled water from the fridge in there. I stopped to take a look at the sky and I noticed the object sailing across the sky. First of all, it was moving VERY fast. It was spherical and giving off a fixed red glow. There were no flashing lights or noises. The object smoothly sailed off. I lost sight of the object when it went beyond the horizon.
trends: There have been 24 other sightings in Norfolk
There were no other sightings in Norfolk on or around October 21st 2008
